resources.string:
How to encrypt text?
 1. In the top box, type the text or paste it from the clipboard by clicking on the «+»
 2. Specify the encryption key (this is a phrase, a date, or a three-digit code)
 3. Click the «Encrypt» button (at right of the top panel) to encrypt the text


Encrypted text appeared in the bottom field You can "Share via messenger" or "Copy text to clipboard"

How to decrypt text?
 1. Use the «+» button to paste the encrypted text from the clipboard into the top box
 2. Specify the encryption key (this is a phrase, a date, or a three-digit code)
 3. Click the «Decrypt» button (center of the top panel) to decrypt the text


Decrypted text will appear in the bottom box"

The beginning of the encrypted text is added "enigma: //", it is very convenient for the recipient. The recipient will only need to click on the encrypted text in any messenger, after which the Enigma application will open and the auto cipher will be inserted into the top field. Supported since Enigma 2.0.
Title on the buttons - Shows for 2 seconds the button labels, "MENU" and "HELP" when the application is launched
If the decrypted text contains a url link - you can click and go to the browser; If there is an address in the text - then to the map, etc.
Decryption error: not a valid key or encrypted text copied incompletely
